profile.greeting: Welcome to Original Coast {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Blanket U where you can donate or request blankets.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the features
get_started.help: What we can do to help you today?

donor.prompt: Hi {{userFirstName}}, there are many people in need of blankets, a basic necessity. We're glad you're willing to help.
donor.question: How many blankets would you like to donate?

donee.prompt: Hi {{userFirstName}}, if you're looking for warm and comfortable blankets, you've come to the right place. We're here to help!
donee.question: How many blankets do you need?

survey.prompt: Hi, want to get quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
